Schema.name: Shared Operational Support (Common Back Office Functions)

Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Shared Operational Support (Common Back Office Functions)

ExpressionView.SQL: SELECT ID, LABEL || ' - Average client satisfaction score of the Integrated Service Center' as LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='ClientSatisfactionScore'

select cp4.ID, cp4.DESIGNATION, cp4.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, -1) AS SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp4.COUNTRY_LEVELHACT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as COUNTRY_LEVELHACT_COUNT, CASE cp4.COUNTRY_LEVELHACT WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as COUNTRY_LEVELHACT, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN CP4.INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER_AVAILABLE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER_AVAILABLE_COUNT, CASE CP4.INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER_AVAILABLE WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER_AVAILABLE, CASE WHEN CP4.HASBOSCOMMON_SERVICE_LINES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASBOSCOMMON_SERVICE_LINES_COUNT, CASE CP4.HASBOSCOMMON_SERVICE_LINES WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HASBOSCOMMON_SERVICE_LINES, COALESCE(cp4integratedservicecenter.HOST_ID, -1) AS HOST_ID, cp4integratedservicecenter.BUDGET, COALESCE(cp4integratedservicecenter.CLIENT_SATISFACTION_SCORE_ID, -1) AS CLIENT_SATISFACTION_SCORE_ID, CASE WHEN CP4.jointhact = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as jointhact_count, CASE CP4.jointhact WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as jointhact_dim, CASE WHEN CP4.joint_macro_assessment = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as joint_macro_assessment_count, CASE CP4.joint_macro_assessment WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as joint_macro_assessment_dim, CASE WHEN CP4.joint_micro_assessment = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as joint_micro_assessment_count, CASE CP4.joint_micro_assessment WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as joint_micro_assessment_dim, CASE WHEN CP4.joint_assurance_activities = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as joint_assurance_activities_count, CASE CP4.joint_assurance_activities WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as joint_assurance_activities_dim from CP4COMMON_SERVICES_HARMONIZED_BUSINES_PRACTICES cp4, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v, CP4INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER cp4integratedservicecenter WHERE cp4.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp4.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR AND cp4integratedservicecenter.PARENT_ID = CP4.ID AND cp4.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp4.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND cp4.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 and cp4.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp4.ENTITY_YEAR

Cube.name: Common Services
Cube.caption: Business Operations Strategy and Common Back Office Functions

Dimension.name: Is a HACT being implemented at the country level
Dimension.caption: Is a HACT being implemented at the country level?

Dimension.name: integratedServiceCenterAvailable
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have a Common Back Office/Integrated Service Center in place to deliver some or all of the services under the BOS?

Dimension.name: host
Dimension.caption: Which UN entity currently hosts the Common Back Office/Integrated service center?

Dimension.name: clientSatisfactionScore
Dimension.caption: What is the average client satisfaction score of the Common Back Office/Integrated Service Center?

Attribute.name: clientSatisfactionScore
Attribute.caption: What is the average client satisfaction score of the Common Back Office/Integrated Service Center?

Dimension.name: hasBOSCommonServiceLines
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have a Business Operations Strategy (BOS)?

Dimension.name: jointHACT
Dimension.caption: Has the HACT being implemented jointly across the UNCT?

Dimension.name: jointMacroAssessment
Dimension.caption: Has the macro assessment being executed jointly?

Dimension.name: jointMicroAssessment
Dimension.caption: Is one or more of the micro assessment being executed jointly?

Dimension.name: jointAssuranceActivities
Dimension.caption: Are the assurance activities being executed jointly?

Measure.name: countryLevelHACT
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is a HACT being implemented at the country level?'

Measure.name: UnctHaveIntegratedServiceCenter
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT have a Common Back Office/Integrated Service Center in place to deliver some or all of the services under the BOS?'

Measure.name: Budget
Measure.caption: Annual budget of the Common Back Office/Integrated Service Center in US dollars

Measure.name: CommonServiceLinesPartOfBos
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT have a Business Operations Strategy (BOS)?'

Measure.name: jointHACT
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the HACT being implemented jointly across the UNCT?'

Measure.name: jointMacroAssessment
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the macro assessment being executed jointly?'

Measure.name: jointMicroAssessment
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is one or more of the micro assessment being executed jointly?'

Measure.name: jointAssuranceActivities
Measure.caption: Count of 'Are the assurance activities being executed jointly?'

ForeignKeyLink.dimension: Is a HACT being implemented at the country level
